about_the_game:
Hi Commander!

This is the independent page of the Endless Trek Demo, which is dedicated to providing you with a free test version!

The Demo currently has basic combat, construction, planting, survival, exploration, custom skill gameplay and Steam online functions. You only need to start the game and create a character and world, open the Steam friend list, press the right mouse button, and choose to invite friends to experience it online!

During the development process, we optimized it through continuous trial play, but after several tests, we found that there were still many unexpected bugs. So we decided to put the Demo on the shelves permanently and invite players who like this kind of game to test it together. Of course, there is still a lot of content to the EA version.

At the same time, everyone is welcome to speak freely. For example, if you have any wishes for this kind of game, or if you encounter any problems in the game, think there are unreasonable problems, or think it is not fun, you are welcome to point them out.

We have built some communities to absorb everyone's opinions. Welcome all commanders to follow and communicate↓

We are also working hard to build an English community. Please point out the unprofessional translation. Please forgive me.

The original universe was originally a huge and complete space, but because of a devastating disaster, time and space split broke out. After that, a number of independent worlds of different sizes were born, and the original world was one of them!

As one of the only commanders left in the old world, like the ancestors who opened up the new world, we formed a fearless expeditionary force, crossed the space crack between the old world and the old world, and came here to investigate. After entering the original world, we found that the space crack was only one-way and we could no longer return. In this unknown primitive world, there are natives with unknown positions and terrifying creatures, as well as mysterious fogs, which hinder our exploration. We can only unite and build a home here to survive! Maybe we can find a way back...

The inspiration for making this game comes from classic sandbox survival games such as "Conan Exiles", "valheim" and "Ark Survival ".

Main features:

Explore the rich ecosystem in the open world

A brand new primitive world, tribes and creatures of the original ecology

Mist of Uryenresen

The unknown fog will be expelled if you force it to break through!

Build camps & homes

Collect resources to build territory stones and build our own homes!

Biological interaction

Tame these primitive creatures and defeat them! Win your rewards, or you can choose to carry them directly or use them!

Strategic battles

No weapon restrictions! Freely combine actions and moves in various postures

Online cooperation

The Demo currently supports the steam online function, and you can invite online in the steam friend list。

Control the ancient heroes（Under development Not yet completed）

The powerful ancient heroes scattered around the world can assist us in the battle, but the premise is that you have to win their trust or sacrifice your life!
detailed_description:
Hi Commander!

This is the independent page of the Endless Trek Demo, which is dedicated to providing you with a free test version!

The Demo currently has basic combat, construction, planting, survival, exploration, custom skill gameplay and Steam online functions. You only need to start the game and create a character and world, open the Steam friend list, press the right mouse button, and choose to invite friends to experience it online!

During the development process, we optimized it through continuous trial play, but after several tests, we found that there were still many unexpected bugs. So we decided to put the Demo on the shelves permanently and invite players who like this kind of game to test it together. Of course, there is still a lot of content to the EA version.

At the same time, everyone is welcome to speak freely. For example, if you have any wishes for this kind of game, or if you encounter any problems in the game, think there are unreasonable problems, or think it is not fun, you are welcome to point them out.

We have built some communities to absorb everyone's opinions. Welcome all commanders to follow and communicate↓

We are also working hard to build an English community. Please point out the unprofessional translation. Please forgive me.

The original universe was originally a huge and complete space, but because of a devastating disaster, time and space split broke out. After that, a number of independent worlds of different sizes were born, and the original world was one of them!

As one of the only commanders left in the old world, like the ancestors who opened up the new world, we formed a fearless expeditionary force, crossed the space crack between the old world and the old world, and came here to investigate. After entering the original world, we found that the space crack was only one-way and we could no longer return. In this unknown primitive world, there are natives with unknown positions and terrifying creatures, as well as mysterious fogs, which hinder our exploration. We can only unite and build a home here to survive! Maybe we can find a way back...

The inspiration for making this game comes from classic sandbox survival games such as "Conan Exiles", "valheim" and "Ark Survival ".

Main features:

Explore the rich ecosystem in the open world

A brand new primitive world, tribes and creatures of the original ecology

Mist of Uryenresen

The unknown fog will be expelled if you force it to break through!

Build camps & homes

Collect resources to build territory stones and build our own homes!

Biological interaction

Tame these primitive creatures and defeat them! Win your rewards, or you can choose to carry them directly or use them!

Strategic battles

No weapon restrictions! Freely combine actions and moves in various postures

Online cooperation

The Demo currently supports the steam online function, and you can invite online in the steam friend list。

Control the ancient heroes（Under development Not yet completed）

The powerful ancient heroes scattered around the world can assist us in the battle, but the premise is that you have to win their trust or sacrifice your life!
name: 无尽之界 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 (High settings) and 1070 (Ultra settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Endless Trek is a multiplayer open world survival crafting game developed by the four of us. The demo will be updated every two weeks. It is free to play and feedback is welcome! We really need effective and sharp reviews!
